Opinion
Pee Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Sigismondi, Appellant, v. DeVincentis Construction Co.
Argued April 21, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Boberts, JJ.
reargument refused July 2, 1965.
Gerald Gornish, with him Leonard Zack, for appellant.
W. Glenn George, for appellees.
May 25, 1965:
